thread.title: Lambs Farm's annual Barn Burner BBQ coming Oct. 16-17
thread.title_full: Lambs Farm's annual Barn Burner BBQ coming Oct. 16-17 - DailyHerald.com

author: Daily Herald report
title: Lambs Farm's annual Barn Burner BBQ coming Oct. 16-17
text:
Lambs Farm is hosting the 10th annual Barn Burner BBQ, a Kansas City Barbecue Association-sanctioned event, Friday and Saturday, Oct. 16-17. The competition will be in the main parking lot, 14245 Rockland Road, Libertyville, where the Grand Championship title and a chance to compete at national events are both at stake. In addition to barbecue, from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Saturday there also will be family activities, food trucks, live music, and raffles. Participants and vendors are needed. Visit www.lambsfarm.org . Anyone interested in being a vendor can email Kathy McMeins at kmcmeins@lambsfarm.org or call (847) 990-3749.
 News Green Oaks Libertyville Food
